channel.title: Runescape tutorial island
channel.description: With no tutorial of some type, there are many more spammers around Runescape and I mean A LOT more. Who agrees they should bring back tutorial island or atleast some type of tutorial after making a new account?

item.title: Runescape tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

If the simple solution to preventing gold site spammers is bringing back a tutorial or some sort of captcha then i can’t believe they didn’t do that.

Read full topic

item.description:

I can make the interface still come up I think but that’s all that’s left

item.title: Runescape tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:

With no tutorial of some type, there are many more spammers around Runescape and I mean A LOT more. Who agrees they should bring back tutorial island or atleast some type of tutorial after making a new account?

They removed tutorial island?

Yes. Like a year or 2 ago…
[/quote]

the island is still there[/quote]

What’s your point? You can’t do the tutorial anymore.

item.title: Runescape tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:27, topic:412539”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=513801.msg3732620#msg3732620 date=1314700350]

There is now no tutorial at all? I also miss the old tutorial island, it was quite fun and taught you how to do most stuff. Now you just kill a dragon?

a noob dragon that sleeps when u feed it
[/quote]

no. They changed that a couple weeks ago. Now there is NO tutorial at all.[/quote]

ROFL’d at that.

Anieli:

They should add a recaptcha into it like before when you select what ‘class’ you want to be.

Totally agree with you 100%

Pompano21:

They need to bring it back, spammers piss me off in Lumbridge.

I also agree with you, spammers are also beginning to piss me off.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

m1lkman:

There will be a conquest bot in like 3 months or so i know it. Artificial intelligence will take that minigame over.

jagex just might be pricks again and change the gfx of the soldiers, just like what they did to the wildy ditch to a wildy wall, sure it’ll fuck up the bot for a lil bit

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:21, topic:412539”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=513801.msg3732113#msg3732113 date=1314671170]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=513801.msg3732095#msg3732095 date=1314670840]

if you can make a bot for algorithmic mini games and activies (barrows/mobilizing armies) then I’m pretty sure you could make a bot for tutorial island.

1 thing you can’t bot, and that’s conquest.

In couple of months, a bot is gonna come out for it, they said a lot of things were unbottable but they ended up being botted.

Conquest has been out for awhile I believe, it’s just too difficult to make a bot for conquest… Many have tried on rsbuddy, many have failed.

it also took a while for a dungeoneering bot, but there are a few flawless bots now…

That’s a skillbot, a conquest bot must be able to move the soldiers and be able to put up a good fight, It also needs to use special abilities and know when to attack the opponent’s soldier’s too.
This is a lot to do for a minigame.
[/quote]Yea and a dungeoneering bot needs to know how to complete randomly generated dungeons, I bet you in 2-3 more months there will be a flawless one.

Lol yeah, but the conquest bot has to deal with completely random and different techniques used by people in conquest.
[/quote]Well I have never even played conquest so im going to stop here even though im pretty sure it will be done.[/quote]

I’ll give you a vid on conquest in rs:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Of67g0_U5Bk[/youtube]

Read full topic
